# Array Library

### Task

Declare `nums` array correctly to make `.fill` method works correctly. 

### Provided Code

```cpp
#include <array>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
  // Your Code Here

  // Do Not Edit
  nums.fill(100);
  cout << nums[0] << "\n"; // 100
  cout << nums[1] << "\n"; // 100
  cout << nums[2] << "\n"; // 100

  return 0;
}
